ygData.messageBody:
What is definition of wizard ? I liked to start this thread as I see that many
people don∩┐╜t understand what is a idea for a wizard class is in Everquest and
what is to be changed so that we can be better in our role. So here is a my
look on this maybe I∩┐╜m wrong but that is why we are here ;-)

Wizard is a master Explorer he looks for a knowledge about world, magic, items
and people all around a world. Why he do this is of many reasons to help his
greed for immense power?, wish to help a weak ones or any other reason it is
not important now but all wizards try to do this.
To be able to do this he is a god land traveler, he can unleash a nice power in
combat and he can see things from long away.

I divide a letter from here on in 3 parts
1st is my propose, what to change so that our class can better execute our
role in world of North
2nd is what explanation of what I see that we are now
3rd is spell grouping

1. -------

As I see our class must combat to get

a.) better run from combat teleport spells - shadow step with minimum range -
faster gate - second bind point (in zone only) it can be some type of faster
gate for run from combat spells

b.) Better exploration spells like invisible eye of zoom with longer duration.

c.) Item locator. As we are item hunters we can have a spell which can function
as ranger tracker for items in zone so we can see all items in zone and we can
turn in direction where item is !!

d.) faster mana recovery then other classes - ( or by higher meditation limit
lets say (level +1) * 7 or by specific items wizard only later in game) - why
this you can ask. because in combat other classes have a mana battery which is
a pet it can defend, attack and also sacrifice and many more long duration
buffing spells.

e.) one thing which is not wizard specific but influence us, is to make a
meditation more diversifying I wish to play a game not to stay looking all time
in same page or go in WC, kitchen when I meditate it will be nice to have
- internal email system
- two chat windows so that I can access general all server chat same one which
we can go in from server screen in one window and to hear what going on in game
in other window
- in game class oriented mailing lists


2.----


- He is a weakest class in all Norath looking at hit points, but he is a major
destructive power in game also.

- Wizard casts Direct Damage DD spells faster than anyone else and with more
force than anyone else. We as a class get a DD spell EVERY level and we have a
best mana damage ratio on them.

- Wizards have a experience diminution I don∩┐╜t know how much for sure but it is
near 10 - 15 %.

- Wizards are very weak at start and at lv 20 start to be traveler and only at
lv 34 + start to be a force in all ways from solo to group play with all line
of plane travel and group rescue spells.
( you see that a spells go from a 5 (1 lv.)- 15 (4 lv) - 35 (8 lv) - 80 (12 lv)
- 105 (16 lv) all times mana gives you cc. 5 shots before go out of mana OOM
when you go up in lv you get a some additional roots in)

- Wizard combat definition is major damage in shortest time!
- Enchanter goes with more suptile tactic with pet, weaking enemy or charming
- necromancer rely on his strong pet and Damage Over Time spells DOT
where he is a master this spells do in time much more damage then DD spells of
wizards but..)
- Magician is support ( food, bandages, heatstone etc )and (now reinforced) pet
man.
